mapper.select: SELECT TIP_NO as tip_no , USER_NICK as tip_user_nick , CATEGORY as tip_category , TIP_TITLE as tip_title , TIP_CONTENT as tip_content , TIP_FILE as tip_file , TIP_DATE as tip_date , TIP_COUNT as tip_count , TIP_BOOKMARK as tip_bookmark , TIP_BMUSER as tip_bmuser FROM INTERIOR_TIP WHERE USER_NICK = #{tip_user_nick}

SELECT TIP_NO as tip_no , USER_NICK as tip_user_nick , CATEGORY as tip_category , TIP_TITLE as tip_title , TIP_CONTENT as tip_content , TIP_FILE as tip_file , TIP_DATE as tip_date , TIP_COUNT as tip_count , TIP_BOOKMARK as tip_bookmark , TIP_BMUSER as tip_bmuser FROM INTERIOR_TIP WHERE TIP_BMUSER LIKE #{tip_user_nick}%
